'''Polished diorite stairs''' are a [[polished diorite]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Polished diorite stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Polished Diorite Stairs
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}
